title: Philadelphia Sporting Life PC and T212-2 Obak For Sale ***SOLD***
author: Jacklitsch

posts.post_title: Philadelphia Sporting Life PC and T212-2 Obak For Sale ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
In a baseball career that spanned 10 years from 1904 through 1914 Jim Byrnes had a major league cup of coffee in 1906 playing 10 games for the Philadelphia Athletics. He went on from there to play for various PCL and NW league teams appearing on the 1910 T212-2 Obak with Tacoma.
Offered today is pretty special, at least to me. Here is the 1906 Sporting Life Team postcard of the Philadelphia AL team While Jim Byrnes is not pictured among the players the inscription is what I find interesting It reads:

“Sept. 3, 1907
Jim,
Here are your old teammates. How do they look? Guess we get another flag.
/s/ Unknown”

The card is postally used with a green Ben Franklin 1 cent stamp and is addressed to Mr. James Byrnes in San Francisco
Attached is the postcard and his 1910 Obak card.
 I’m asking $400 paypal f/f for the two and am pretty firm.
Email ONLY, no DM’s, no posts to this thread. Email: [url]ahlaw555@msn.com[/url]
